director.name: 约翰·阿卜杜勒-努尔 Yohann Abdelnour

introduction: The ANIJAM is a YAP x ANIMOK collaboration between 8 animators from Lebanon and Denmark. The last frame from the sequence is the first frame of the next.ANIJAM’s first edition was made in partnership with the Viborg Animation Festival, The Animation Workshop - VIA University College, and the Academie Libanaise des Beaux-Arts - ALBA in Beirut, Lebanon.
